about_the_game:
Beat Survival is a survival action open world RPG Pixel graphics game where a single player or 2 player local co-op can do crafting, beat and shoot some zombies, enemies and wild animals up. Every creature that has been killed will turn into zombies. It's almost like a real simulation when you try to survive in a zombie epidemic situation. You loot, scavenge, craft as well as dismantle, make traps and explosive bombs, trade with NPC, and do some missions to get skill points and rewards.

You can play alone or with any friend and family on 2 player local co-op with more fun and challenging interactions, try to survive, add more skill by accomplishing missions in different locations and weather / day and night and times. Those skills you can add such as carpentry, electrician, swimming, driving, healing others, commanding others, stealing, cooking, crafting, repairing / fixing, throwing boomerang, fishing, and crafting would be available depending on what level you choose.

Surviving as long as you can try with Easy level first when you are automatically equipped with those skills and allowed to revive view times combating those zombies, NPC and wild animals, or you can jump into Hard level which you only live once fighting with stronger enemies.

Beat Survival Features:

*You play alone or with a local co-op. Both can use keyboard and mouse or just using PS4 DualShock gamepad, Xbox gamepad or Generic gamepad (similar to

PS4 Dual shock gamepad).

*Survive in winter, spring, summer and autumn. You deal with Rain, dry, hot and cold weather in bright and dark conditions.

*Loot / scavenge or create more than hundreds of items and weapons.

*More enemies, NPCs, new locations, and items on DLC Expansion than Early Access.

*Elevator system! Yeah, this game is more unique because you can use elevators for higher buildings such as hospitals and apartments. Beware enemies and

zombies can follow you if they accidently go inside. They can also use stairs.

*Players can board up the door and window or dismantle it. You can jump from a window on a higher building, but it may hurt and kill you depending on level of

the floor is.

*More than 20 different types of vehicles. Get the vehicle key and driving skill first or buy vehicle at Auto dealership is also a good option.

*Only one mission is available on Early Access for you to try free, but you will be able to play all missions with DLC expansion.

*Shoot them up with different types of firearms or burn them up with crafted Molotov or you can set some traps for your enemies.

*Melee weapons are also available such as knife, baseball bat, spiked baseball bat, boomerang, machete, chainsaw, hammer, shovel, scissor, axe, bow, spear

etc.

*On 2 player local co-op, you can split or one screen depending on what you like by simply pressing the split/one screen button.

*Screen can be zoomed in and out while playing the game for your convenient.

*Help menu is available after pause the game to show how to play and features in the game.

*Set electric and water consumption to never, always, 5 days, 10 days and 30 days to what you like in the game.

*Fog of war set up that will show the location visible where you've been on map, or you can turn it off to show the whole map.

*Set player vision to enabled will show on screen any moving objects like enemy or NPC where the player is facing.

*Other player's conditions display besides Life such as Hunger, Thirst, Hygiene, Stamina, Stress, Health, Wound, Infection, Cut and Body Temperature.

*Throwing body, garbage bin, chairs, table to fight your enemies like in any beat-up game.

*Dismantle traps or create traps to eliminate your enemies and hunting animals.

*Chop some trees, farming or fishing.

*Travel with a boat exploring a huge map that hasn't been visited.

*Wear any helmet, mask (Kabuki, soldering, Ninja, etc) for protections.

Many more...

short_description: Beat Survival is 2D pixel action-adventure survival game where you can play as single or in 2 players local co-op where you start driving around, looting, scavenging, crafting, fishing, dismantling and do more missions. Not only you fight the bad guy and zombies, but you also interact with others.
